subject: Mancanza boccole piastra
description_text:
Buon giorno ho ordinato per natale una pedaliera completa ma all interno
mancano le viti con boccola per alzare  la piastra ...

conversations.body_text: Hi andrea corona,  Is the 30 mm support pin missing? Please provide your order number, contact name, address, and phone number, and we will send a replacement promptly tomorrow.
